ack.p: The authors would like to thank the following for their valuable contributions: Zuxu Yao and Talisha Allen from DermTech, Inc., Robert Dunstan, Huo Li, David Martin, Norman Allaire, Marian Themeles, Anne Ranger, Amy Kao, Kejie Li and Margaret Choy Merola. The authors wrote the first draft of the manuscript and Linda Wagner of Excel Scientific Solutions provided editorial support. Miranda Dixon from Excel Scientific Solutions copyedited and styled the manuscript.
